job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Description:·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Screenings Team aims to increase user safety, reduce the frequency of property damage incidents, and help maintain our brand. ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We perform background checks and other data searches to score a user's risk.&nbsp;Requirements:·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3+ years of data science, data analytics, or business intelligence experience·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong understanding of SQL·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience conducting data analysis in Python·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;BS/BA in CS or related fieldPreferred Qualifications: o&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior experience at a major tech company and/or in management consultingo&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Superseto&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation testso&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with machine learning basicso&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with our infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQLo&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience creating and maintaining data pipelineso&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience supporting engineering product worko&nbsp;&nbsp;MS/MA in CS or related field
